Player History
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,596,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/5/1985...
Had first career hit on 4/26/1985, off Roger McDowell (NYM)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1985, going 3-1, 1.13...
7/28/1986: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $6,730,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1986, going 4-1, 1.20...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/20/1988 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 7/13/1989 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Atlanta on 7/5/1990 (Going to ATL: P Dennis Martinez, SS Terry Pendleton, P Mike Hartley. Going to STL: P Cecilio Guante, P Graeme Lloyd, C Javy Lopez)...
Released by Atlanta on 9/10/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/23/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Traded from Los Angeles to San Diego on 7/12/1991 (Going to SD: P Dennis Martinez. Going to LAD: P Jack Armstrong)...
Pitched PERFECT GAME against Montreal on 7/13/1991, striking out 6...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Chicago on 7/18/1991, striking out 6...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1991, going 3-0, 0.47...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/10/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Detroit on 5/28/1993, striking out 9...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1993, winning 2 games with a 0.45 ERA...
Retired in 1993.
